name: Saffron Riding Coat
description:
Our Riding inspired tailored overcoat features a classic notch lapel collar, upper mini flap pocket and lower slant pockets.  Kal's signature red undercollar and inside detail with stripe sleeve lining.  Single Horn button closure at front, 2-button cuff and a high back vent make this a simple but stylish every day coat.

100% Wool
MADE IN NYC 
Dry Clean Only
Original Price: $1,044


Please contact sales@kalrieman.com for more information.

name: Ginna Swing Tunic
description:
Pre-Order available only.
Use Code SS14PRE at checkout for 15% off savings through December 31, 2013
please contact us at sales@kalrieman.com for more information

I always love see the evolution of a style.  We took what we loved from the Fall 13 Ginna Tunic and made it into an easier, laid back version for Spring.  The coolest collar construction is now complimented by a large center back pleat, straight hem, and exaggerated cuff to put the swing into this style.
Shown in Blue Stripe and Yellow Stripe, this style is also offered in solid white and our Brick Red Stripe.

100% Cotton 
MADE IN NYC
Dry Clean or Machine Wash
